resources.string:
* Brain WarmUp! is an arithmetic game.

* Choose Easy, Medium or Hard level to begin.

* Answer the question by typing on the number pad displayed and pressing enter. 

* Press the C button to clear an existing answer.

* Each question may be an addition, subtraction, multiplication or division.

* Your ten best scores will automatically be saved into the High Scores.
Hi, \n\nYour Feedback sample app rocks! I would like to give you some feedback:
